screen_desc: The screenshot shows the "System" settings menu of an Android smartphone. It includes options for "Languages & input" (set to Gboard), "Gestures," "Date & time" (set to GMT-07:00 Pacific Daylight Time), and "Backup" (currently off). There is also an "Advanced" section with options like "Reset options" and "System update." The screen allows users to configure system-related settings.
action_think: The user has requested to change the appearance of the keyboard. The current screen shows the 'System' settings menu, with an option for 'Languages & input' that may allow us to modify the keyboard settings. Since 'Languages & input' is set to Gboard, the next step is to click on 'Languages & input' to explore the keyboard settings and change its appearance.
action_plan: Click on 'Languages & input' to access the keyboard settings.
Explore the available options within Gboard to change its appearance.
Modify the keyboard look as per the user's preference.
action_result:
By clicking on "Languages & input" in the last action, you have navigated to the section of the settings where you can manage input methods, including keyboard settings. In the current screenshot, we can see the list of available keyboards and the option to manage the "Virtual keyboard," which includes Gboard and voice typing.

This action has made progress towards fulfilling your request to change the keyboard look, as it allows you to modify settings related to the virtual keyboard. To proceed with changing the look of the keyboard, you would need to select the "Virtual keyboard" option, where you can then customize the appearance and other settings of Gboard or any other virtual keyboard you may have installed.

Therefore, this action has successfully brought you closer to completing your request.
prev_action_result: By clicking on the "System" option, you have navigated to the system settings. From this screen, you can now explore options related to language settings, gestures, and other system preferences. This action is a step towards fulfilling your user request, as the next logical step would be to navigate to the "Languages & input" section where you can change the keyboard settings. Therefore, this action has brought you closer to the completion of your request.
